column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Tourist review: I'm from Texas so when a restaurant in Chicago touted their Elote corn and Ribeye steaks I had to put them to the test. The steak was great
column3: cooked to perfection (medium rare) and right on with the seasoning without charing. The Elote was very close to home
column4: I'm sure it's a big hit here. Throw in the great service from the bar staff and you get 5 stars
column5: I sat at a high top. Drink order wasn't a run of the mill choice
column7: great job on that also. No complaints here
column8: oh yeah you gotta try the bread.
